Question & Options:
Which of the following terms can be considered synonyms or alternative terms for 'Delhi Belly' from the movie released in 2011?
Options:
A. Tummy Trouble
B. Bellyache
C. Stomach Upset
D. Delhi Stomach
Correct Answer: Tummy Trouble, Bellyache, Stomach Upset, Delhi Stomach
